content.text: Vanuatu, a Pacific island nation, has become a premier online gaming licensing jurisdiction. Through its rigorous system of regulation, favorable tax regime, and simplified application procedure, the Vanuatu Interactive Gaming License (VIGL) has become a viable choice for operators seeking to access international iGaming markets.
Why Choose a Vanuatu Gaming License?
The Vanuatu Interactive Gaming License offers several compelling advantages for online gaming operators:

items: No VAT, income tax, or corporate tax for online gambling operations
Only 1% of gross gaming revenue is taxable
Streamlined application process with clear requirements
Access to major payment processors and banking solutions

content.text: To successfully obtain a VIGL license, operators must meet specific criteria and provide comprehensive documentation:

items: Proof of financial stability and adequate capitalization
Detailed business plan and operational procedures
Background checks for key personnel and beneficial owners

content.text: The VIGL application process typically takes 6-8 weeks from submission to approval, provided all documentation is complete and accurate. The process includes:

items: Initial application review and fee payment

content.text: Licensed operators must maintain strict compliance with VIGL regulations throughout their operations. This includes regular reporting, maintaining adequate financial reserves, and implementing robust player protection measures.
